name: PrimalMyst Attributes Hexagon
description: The character development implementation of the universal hexagonal pattern, translating the cosmic principles embodied by the Eldritch Gods into personal growth pathways and capability enhancement.

foundational_pattern.cosmic_principle: The six-fold nature of existence manifests in all aspects of reality, from divine consciousness to mortal potential and growth
foundational_pattern.eldritch_reference: Each attribute reflects the essential nature and developmental focus of its corresponding Eldritch God

center.description: The central understanding that true power comes from balanced development of all aspects of the self. A complete Myst-Walker develops not just raw capabilities, but understanding of how each attribute serves their cosmic destiny and divine alignment, reflecting the perfect balance that Yggdrasil maintains across all existence.

corners.brief_description: Mental acuity, magical understanding, and analytical thinking
corners.eldritch_archetype: Glacius, the Eternal Frost - Perfect knowledge and preservation of all understanding
corners.divine_manifestation: The way Glacius embodies absolute knowledge and perfect memory, understanding all things completely
corners.core_philosophy: Knowledge is the foundation of all power

corners.brief_description: Flexibility, creativity, and ability to handle unexpected situations
corners.eldritch_archetype: Serafina, the Shadow Empress - Infinite flexibility and creative transformation
corners.divine_manifestation: The way Serafina constantly changes and adapts, never being the same twice, embracing all possibilities
corners.core_philosophy: Change is the only constant, adaptation is survival

corners.brief_description: Speed, agility, precision, and hand-eye coordination
corners.eldritch_archetype: Voltharion, the Cosmic Spark - Lightning-fast precision and instant connection
corners.divine_manifestation: The way Voltharion moves with perfect speed and precision across the cosmic web, never missing a connection

corners.brief_description: Life force, health, regeneration, and transformative energy
corners.eldritch_archetype: Korthak, the Dragon King - Overwhelming vitality and transformative life force
corners.divine_manifestation: The way Korthak embodies the creative fire of existence itself, constantly generating new life and transformation through physical mastery
corners.core_philosophy: Life energy is the fire that burns within

corners.brief_description: Physical power, endurance, and forceful presence
corners.eldritch_archetype: Pyrion, the First Flame - Raw transformative power and forceful creation
corners.divine_manifestation: The way Pyrion embodies pure physical dominance and creative force, reshaping reality through strength of will
corners.core_philosophy: Strength enforces creation, power transforms reality

corners.brief_description: Insight, intuition, spiritual awareness, and divine connection
corners.eldritch_archetype: Aurelius, the Radiant Sphere - Divine insight and spiritual transcendence
corners.divine_manifestation: The way Aurelius embodies perfect spiritual understanding and connection to divine truth

fundamental_trinity.name: The Fundamental Trinity
fundamental_trinity.description: The core physical and mental capabilities that form the foundation of all mortal potential

mechanics.gear_requirements: Equipment has specific fundamental attribute requirements
mechanics.skill_prerequisites: Most abilities require minimum levels in fundamental attributes
mechanics.material_focus: Govern interaction with the physical and magical realms

lore_foundations.cosmic_principle: The Fundamental Trinity represents the raw building blocks of mortal capability - the mind that comprehends, the body that acts, and the force that shapes
lore_foundations.yggdrasil_manifestation: These attributes flow from Yggdrasil's three primary roots that anchor reality in comprehensible, actionable form
lore_foundations.divine_embodiment: Glacius demonstrates perfect Intelligence, Voltharion exemplifies absolute Dexterity, and Korthak manifests pure Strength
lore_foundations.material_mastery: Fundamental attributes determine how effectively a being can manipulate the physical and magical laws of existence

intelligence_skills.magical_theory: Intelligence 25+ required for advanced spellcrafting and magical item creation
intelligence_skills.scholarly_research: Intelligence 15+ needed for complex knowledge synthesis and academic pursuits
intelligence_skills.tactical_planning: Intelligence 20+ enables advanced battle strategy and logistical coordination
intelligence_skills.arcane_engineering: Intelligence 30+ allows manipulation of fundamental magical forces and reality alteration

dexterity_skills.precision_crafting: Dexterity 20+ required for masterwork item creation and delicate manipulation
dexterity_skills.acrobatic_combat: Dexterity 25+ enables advanced aerial maneuvers and impossible movement
dexterity_skills.stealth_mastery: Dexterity 15+ needed for professional infiltration and silent movement
dexterity_skills.speed_casting: Dexterity 30+ allows instantaneous spell activation and combat reflexes

strength_skills.heavy_weaponry: Strength 25+ required for two-handed weapons and siege equipment operation
strength_skills.architectural_shaping: Strength 20+ enables large-scale construction and terrain modification
strength_skills.intimidating_presence: Strength 15+ provides natural authority and fear-inducing capability
strength_skills.reality_breaking: Strength 30+ allows physical force to overcome magical barriers and natural laws

intelligence_gear.spellcasting_focus: Intelligence 15+ for basic staves, 25+ for master-crafted focuses, 35+ for artifact-level implements
intelligence_gear.knowledge_archives: Intelligence 20+ to access advanced libraries and memory-enhancement devices
intelligence_gear.analytical_tools: Intelligence 10+ for basic calculation aids, 30+ for reality-analysis equipment
intelligence_gear.magical_armor: Intelligence scaling determines maximum enchantment capacity and spell-storing ability

dexterity_gear.precision_weapons: Dexterity 15+ for finesse blades, 25+ for masterwork ranged weapons, 35+ for legendary precision arms
dexterity_gear.mobility_enhancement: Dexterity 20+ for advanced movement gear and acrobatic equipment
dexterity_gear.stealth_equipment: Dexterity 10+ for basic concealment, 30+ for reality-bending invisibility devices
dexterity_gear.speed_augmentation: Dexterity scaling determines maximum movement enhancement and reflex amplification

strength_gear.heavy_armaments: Strength 15+ for war weapons, 25+ for siege equipment, 35+ for reality-cleaving armaments
strength_gear.protective_equipment: Strength 20+ for heavy armor and fortress-grade defensive systems
strength_gear.construction_tools: Strength 10+ for basic crafting, 30+ for architectural and engineering implements
strength_gear.force_multipliers: Strength scaling determines maximum load capacity and power amplification potential

fundamental_manifestation.cosmic_foundation: Intelligence, Dexterity, and Strength are the three pillars upon which all material existence rests. They represent the fundamental forces that shaped reality itself during the cosmic creation.
fundamental_manifestation.yggdrasil_roots: These three attributes flow directly from Yggdrasil's primary root system - the Intelligence Root that comprehends existence, the Dexterity Root that shapes existence, and the Strength Root that anchors existence in reality.
fundamental_manifestation.universal_constants: Unlike transcendent attributes which vary across realms and realities, the fundamental trinity remains constant - every material object, every conscious being, every magical effect requires these three basic components to exist.
fundamental_manifestation.equipment_manifestation: All gear, weapons, armor, and tools in PrimalMyst are inherently tied to fundamental attributes because they represent the basic requirements for manipulating physical reality. No item can exist without fundamental attribute foundations.
fundamental_manifestation.skill_manifestation: Every learnable ability traces back to fundamental attributes - you cannot cast spells without Intelligence to understand them, perform techniques without Dexterity to execute them, or use tools without Strength to wield them.
fundamental_manifestation.divine_embodiment: Glacius (Intelligence), Voltharion (Dexterity), and Korthak (Strength) are not just gods - they are the living manifestations of reality's foundation itself, making their attributes inherently more grounded in existence than transcendent ones.

player_choice_system.fundamental_selection: Every level, players choose ONE fundamental attribute (Intelligence, Dexterity, or Strength) to receive an additional +6 points, representing their character's focused development in that aspect of reality mastery.
player_choice_system.cosmic_significance: This choice reflects the character's growing understanding of which fundamental aspect of existence resonates most strongly with their personal journey and divine calling.
player_choice_system.implementation_note: This system will be implemented through the passive skill tree, allowing players to customize their fundamental attribute growth beyond their class's natural alignment patterns.
player_choice_system.strategic_implications: Players can either double-down on their class's natural fundamental attribute for maximum specialization, or shore up weakness by choosing different fundamentals to create more balanced builds.
player_choice_system.lore_justification: As Myst-Walkers grow in power, they gain deeper insight into the fundamental forces of reality, allowing them to consciously direct their development toward mastery of specific cosmic principles.

transcendent_trinity.name: The Transcendent Trinity
transcendent_trinity.description: The elevated aspects of consciousness that bridge mortal limitations and divine potential

mechanics.divine_resonance: Enhanced by alignment with Eldritch God philosophies
mechanics.threshold_scaling: Provide breakthrough bonuses at specific breakpoints
mechanics.hybrid_nature: Blend multiple influences and cosmic forces
mechanics.transcendent_focus: Govern spiritual growth and divine connection

adaptability_mastery.base_concept: Adaptability represents the fluid intelligence that allows consciousness to reshape itself in response to changing circumstances. Unlike the linear progression of Intelligence, Adaptability grows through breakthrough moments.
adaptability_mastery.serafina_connection: Serafina, the Dreaming Mother, embodies the ultimate expression of Adaptability - the ability to dream new realities into existence and shift between possibilities as needed.
adaptability_mastery.threshold_progression: Every 5 levels in Adaptability unlocks new ways of thinking and perceiving reality, allowing characters to access previously impossible solutions.
adaptability_mastery.transformative_power: High Adaptability allows characters to temporarily respec their builds, access cross-class abilities, and discover hidden synergies between disparate elements.

vitality_mastery.base_concept: Vitality is the raw life force that sustains, heals, and transforms. It represents the fire of existence itself - both creative and destructive, always seeking growth and renewal.
vitality_mastery.pyrion_connection: Pyrion, the First Flame, channels the primal creative fire that sparked all life. Vitality reflects this divine spark within mortals.
vitality_mastery.regenerative_scaling: Every 10 levels in Vitality dramatically increases natural healing rates and unlocks new forms of regeneration - from physical healing to emotional resilience to spiritual renewal.
vitality_mastery.transformative_potential: At high levels, Vitality allows characters to undergo profound transformations - changing species, elemental alignment, or even achieving forms of immortality.

wisdom_mastery.base_concept: Wisdom represents the deep understanding that comes from connection to cosmic principles. It transcends mere knowledge to encompass intuitive grasp of universal truths.
wisdom_mastery.aurelius_connection: Aurelius, the Light Bearer, embodies perfect Wisdom - the ability to see through all illusions and understand the true nature of existence.
wisdom_mastery.divine_connection: Wisdom enhances the character's ability to commune with divine forces, predict future events, and understand the hidden patterns that govern reality.
wisdom_mastery.enlightenment_thresholds: Major Wisdom milestones (20, 40, 60, 80) represent different stages of enlightenment, each unlocking new forms of cosmic awareness.

adaptability_thresholds.level_5: Situational Flexibility - Can adapt to one unexpected circumstance per encounter
adaptability_thresholds.level_10: Cross-Training - Can temporarily access abilities from adjacent classes
adaptability_thresholds.level_15: Reality Shifting - Can alter minor environmental details once per day
adaptability_thresholds.level_20: Possibility Mastery - Can rewrite one decision made in the last hour
adaptability_thresholds.level_25: Dream Logic - Can access impossible combinations of abilities

vitality_thresholds.level_10: Enhanced Regeneration - Heal 10% health per minute outside combat
vitality_thresholds.level_20: Elemental Resistance - Gain resistance to one chosen damage type
vitality_thresholds.level_30: Life Surge - Can enter a temporary state of enhanced vitality
vitality_thresholds.level_40: Metamorphosis - Can temporarily transform into alternate forms
vitality_thresholds.level_50: Phoenix Rebirth - Can return from death once per character lifetime

wisdom_thresholds.level_20: Cosmic Awareness - Gain insight into hidden connections and patterns
wisdom_thresholds.level_40: Divine Communication - Can commune directly with aligned gods
wisdom_thresholds.level_60: Future Sight - Can glimpse possible futures and outcomes
wisdom_thresholds.level_80: Universal Understanding - Comprehend any language or symbolic system

trinity_interactions.fundamental_synergies: Intelligence + Dexterity = tactical precision, Dexterity + Strength = athletic prowess, Strength + Intelligence = calculated force
trinity_interactions.transcendent_synergies: Adaptability + Vitality = transformative resilience, Vitality + Wisdom = enlightened health, Wisdom + Adaptability = intuitive flexibility
trinity_interactions.cross_trinity_bridges: Each fundamental attribute has a transcendent partner that elevates its expression to divine levels

hexagon_dynamics.adjacency_bonuses: Adjacent attributes create natural character synergies - Intelligence+Adaptability enables creative problem-solving, Dexterity+Vitality creates athletic prowess, Strength+Wisdom provides enlightened power.
hexagon_dynamics.opposition_tensions: Opposite attributes represent different character focuses - Intelligence vs Vitality (mind vs life force), Adaptability vs Strength (change vs force), Dexterity vs Wisdom (action vs contemplation).
hexagon_dynamics.full_cycle_effects: Characters who develop all six attributes achieve 'Cosmic Balance' - the ability to respond to any challenge with their strongest aspect while maintaining harmony across all capabilities.

per_level_gains.origin_island_attribute: +6 attribute points per level to character's origin island aligned attribute (based on island hexagonal position)
per_level_gains.adjacent_attributes: +3 attribute points per level to both attributes adjacent to the island-aligned attribute
per_level_gains.next_adjacent_attributes: +2 attribute points per level to attributes one step further from island alignment
per_level_gains.opposing_attribute: +1 attribute point per level to the attribute directly opposite the island-aligned attribute
per_level_gains.player_fundamental_choice: +6 attribute points per level to ONE fundamental attribute of player's choice (Intelligence, Dexterity, or Strength)
per_level_gains.total_per_level: 21 total attribute points distributed each level: 15 from island heritage + 6 from player fundamental choice

player_choice_mechanics.selection_timing: At each level up, players choose which fundamental attribute (Intelligence, Dexterity, or Strength) receives the additional +6 points

strategic_options.specialization_path: Choose the same fundamental attribute that your origin island naturally favors for extreme specialization
strategic_options.balance_path: Choose different fundamental attributes to create more well-rounded character builds
strategic_options.weakness_coverage: Choose fundamental attributes your island heritage doesn't naturally favor to eliminate weak spots
strategic_options.build_adaptation: Adjust your choices as your playstyle and party needs evolve throughout the character's journey

player_choice_mechanics.implementation_method: This choice system will be integrated into the passive skill tree, providing a clear interface for fundamental attribute selection at each level
player_choice_mechanics.lore_integration: Represents the character's growing mastery of fundamental cosmic forces and conscious direction of their spiritual development beyond their island heritage

intelligence_class_with_player_choice.class_progression: Intelligence +6, Adaptability +3, Wisdom +3, Dexterity +2, Strength +2, Vitality +1
intelligence_class_with_player_choice.player_adds: +6 to chosen fundamental (Intelligence, Dexterity, or Strength)
intelligence_class_with_player_choice.specialization_example: Intelligence class choosing Intelligence = +12 Intelligence per level total
intelligence_class_with_player_choice.balance_example: Intelligence class choosing Strength = +6 Intelligence, +8 Strength per level

strength_class_with_player_choice.class_progression: Strength +6, Vitality +3, Dexterity +3, Wisdom +2, Intelligence +2, Adaptability +1
strength_class_with_player_choice.player_adds: +6 to chosen fundamental (Intelligence, Dexterity, or Strength)
strength_class_with_player_choice.specialization_example: Strength class choosing Strength = +12 Strength per level total
strength_class_with_player_choice.balance_example: Strength class choosing Intelligence = +8 Intelligence, +6 Strength per level

progression_explanation.divine_favor: Class alignment represents the natural divine favor characters receive based on their chosen path and cultural background
progression_explanation.conscious_development: Player fundamental choice represents the character's conscious decision to master specific aspects of reality's foundation
progression_explanation.cosmic_balance: The hexagonal pattern ensures balanced growth while allowing focused specialization through player choice
progression_explanation.guaranteed_growth: Every character gains exactly 21 attribute points per level: 15 from natural class progression + 6 from player fundamental selection
progression_explanation.fundamental_emphasis: The additional fundamental choice system emphasizes that Intelligence, Dexterity, and Strength are the bedrock of all advancement in PrimalMyst

fundamental_trinity.pattern: Predictable growth that directly translates to capability increases
fundamental_trinity.focus: Material world interaction and basic competency

transcendent_trinity.pattern: Breakthrough bonuses at key development milestones

cross_system_effects.offensive_scaling: Each attribute affects different offensive approaches
cross_system_effects.defensive_scaling: Each attribute enhances different defensive capabilities
cross_system_effects.skill_requirements: Different abilities require minimum levels in specific attributes
cross_system_effects.equipment_usage: Gear has attribute requirements and scaling bonuses

trinity_specialization.fundamental_focus: Characters who specialize in the Fundamental Trinity become masters of material reality, excelling at traditional combat, crafting, and magical manipulation. The player choice system allows extreme specialization by consistently choosing the same fundamental attribute.
trinity_specialization.transcendent_focus: Characters who specialize in the Transcendent Trinity become bridges between mortal and divine, excelling at spiritual growth, adaptation, and cosmic alignment. These characters benefit from using fundamental choices to shore up their material weaknesses.
trinity_specialization.balanced_development: Characters who develop both trinities equally achieve perfect cosmic balance, embodying the complete hexagonal pattern. The fundamental choice system enables this by allowing strategic selection to maintain balance.

extreme_specialization.approach: Always choose the same fundamental attribute for maximum focused development
extreme_specialization.intelligence_path: Creates unprecedented magical capability and scholarly mastery
extreme_specialization.dexterity_path: Enables unmatched precision, speed, and technical proficiency
extreme_specialization.strength_path: Develops overwhelming physical presence and material dominance
extreme_specialization.risk: Creates significant vulnerabilities in unchosen fundamental areas

balanced_rotation.approach: Cycle through different fundamental attributes to maintain well-rounded development
balanced_rotation.pattern_example: Rotate Intelligence → Dexterity → Strength each level
balanced_rotation.benefit: Eliminates fundamental weaknesses while maintaining specialization
balanced_rotation.timeline: Achieves balanced fundamental development over 3-level cycles

adaptive_selection.approach: Choose fundamentals based on current challenges, party needs, and story developments
adaptive_selection.flexibility: Allows characters to evolve with changing circumstances
adaptive_selection.strategic_depth: Requires ongoing assessment of character needs and growth opportunities
adaptive_selection.narrative_integration: Choices can reflect character development and story progression

weakness_mitigation.approach: Focus fundamental choices on attributes your class doesn't naturally develop
weakness_mitigation.cross_class_access: Enables use of equipment and abilities typically restricted to other classes
weakness_mitigation.build_diversity: Creates unexpected character builds and tactical options
weakness_mitigation.long_term_viability: Prevents characters from being locked out of content due to fundamental deficiencies

progression_patterns.early_game: Class-aligned attribute grows fastest (+6/level) plus player fundamental choice (+6/level) for immediate effectiveness
progression_patterns.mid_game: Adjacent attributes (+3/level) and cumulative fundamental choices create synergistic builds and tactical versatility
progression_patterns.late_game: All attributes reach meaningful levels through natural progression and strategic fundamental choices
progression_patterns.endgame: Perfect cosmic balance becomes achievable through careful fundamental choice planning over the character's lifetime
progression_patterns.level_scaling: Characters gain 21 total attribute points per level: 15 from natural class progression + 6 from player fundamental choice

fundamental_god_alignment.glacius_devotion: Consistent Intelligence choices align with Glacius's cosmic principle of understanding
fundamental_god_alignment.voltharion_devotion: Repeated Dexterity choices resonate with Voltharion's principle of precise action
fundamental_god_alignment.korthak_devotion: Focused Strength choices embody Korthak's principle of overwhelming force
fundamental_god_alignment.divine_recognition: Gods notice and favor characters who consistently choose their aligned fundamental attribute

balanced_cosmic_worship.trinity_balance: Equal rotation through all three fundamental choices demonstrates reverence for the cosmic foundation
balanced_cosmic_worship.universal_harmony: Balanced fundamental development creates resonance with all three Fundamental Gods simultaneously
balanced_cosmic_worship.cosmic_understanding: Characters who master all fundamentals gain insight into the deepest principles of reality

cross_hexagon_integration.damage_type_resonance: Each attribute aligns with a damage type, providing natural effectiveness bonuses when combined appropriately
cross_hexagon_integration.divine_patronage: Gods favor characters who embody their aligned attribute, granting enhanced growth in those areas
cross_hexagon_integration.offensive_interactions: Different attributes enable different offensive layer approaches and effectiveness
cross_hexagon_integration.defensive_interactions: Attribute development determines which defensive layers are most effective for a character

conflict_resolutions.intelligence_vs_strength: Requires gear or abilities that bridge mental and physical approaches
conflict_resolutions.adaptability_vs_vitality: Needs skills that balance change with stability
conflict_resolutions.dexterity_vs_wisdom: Must find harmony between quick action and careful contemplation

hexagonal_universality.cosmic_principle: The hexagon is the most stable and perfect geometric form, naturally arising in all aspects of PrimalMyst's reality
hexagonal_universality.divine_reflection: The Eldritch Gods themselves embody the six-fold pattern, with each god representing a fundamental aspect of consciousness and capability
hexagonal_universality.universal_implementation: All complex systems in PrimalMyst naturally organize around hexagonal patterns because they mirror the cosmic structure of reality itself
hexagonal_universality.yggdrasil_connection: Yggdrasil's six great branches create the foundational hexagonal structure that all other hexagons implement in their specific domains

fundamental_trinity_lore.cosmic_foundation: Intelligence, Dexterity, and Strength represent the three pillars upon which all material existence rests - the cosmic forces that shaped reality itself during creation
fundamental_trinity_lore.yggdrasil_roots: These attributes flow directly from Yggdrasil's primary root system that anchors all existence: the Intelligence Root of comprehension, the Dexterity Root of action, and the Strength Root of power
fundamental_trinity_lore.universal_constants: Unlike transcendent attributes which vary across realms, the fundamental trinity remains constant - every object, being, and effect requires these three components to exist
fundamental_trinity_lore.divine_manifestation: Glacius, Voltharion, and Korthak are not merely gods but living embodiments of reality's foundation itself
fundamental_trinity_lore.material_mastery: All equipment, skills, and abilities trace back to fundamental attributes because they represent the basic requirements for manipulating physical reality

player_choice_lore.conscious_evolution: As Myst-Walkers grow in power, they gain deeper insight into the fundamental forces of reality, allowing them to consciously direct their development toward mastery of specific cosmic principles
player_choice_lore.divine_resonance: Each fundamental choice resonates with the corresponding Fundamental God - consistent Intelligence choices align with Glacius's principle of understanding, Dexterity choices with Voltharion's precision, Strength choices with Korthak's force
player_choice_lore.cosmic_balance: Characters who rotate through all three fundamentals demonstrate reverence for the complete cosmic foundation, achieving harmony with the deepest principles of existence
player_choice_lore.personal_destiny: The fundamental choices represent more than mechanical advancement - they shape the character's cosmic destiny and relationship with the foundational forces of reality
player_choice_lore.transcendent_foundation: Even characters focused on transcendent development must ground their spiritual growth in fundamental understanding - you cannot transcend what you do not first master

lore_integration.mythological_basis: The six attributes reflect the fundamental aspects of consciousness and capability that the Eldritch Gods embody and value in their followers. Characters who understand this pattern develop capabilities that mirror divine consciousness.
lore_integration.cosmic_significance: Understanding all six attributes allows Myst-Walkers to achieve cosmic balance, reflecting the perfect harmony that Yggdrasil maintains across all realms. This understanding reveals the underlying hexagonal nature of existence itself.
lore_integration.divine_connections: Each attribute draws on a specific god's essential nature, allowing mortals to develop aspects of divine consciousness in their personal growth. The gods serve as living embodiments of each attribute's ideal expression.

pattern_recognition.hexagons_are_bestagons: The hexagonal pattern appears throughout PrimalMyst because it represents perfect balance and maximum efficiency in all forms of development
pattern_recognition.natural_manifestations: From skill learning patterns to character growth to divine enlightenment, the six-fold pattern emerges naturally
pattern_recognition.mystical_resonance: Myst-Walkers who recognize and align with hexagonal patterns find their development enhanced by cosmic harmony
pattern_recognition.personal_evolution: Advanced characters naturally balance their growth around hexagonal patterns, unconsciously responding to the cosmic structure
pattern_recognition.fundamental_mastery: The player choice system reflects the deepest truth of PrimalMyst - that conscious mastery of fundamental forces is the path to both material success and spiritual transcendence
